title: New Scotia Pack Box Set: Shield Wolf / Wolf Lover / Fire Wolf
description: SHIELD WOLF, Book OneWHEN HE COULDN'T FIND HIS MATE IN THIS WORLD, THE WENT ELSEWHERE. WOLF LOVER, Book Two What would he be willing to do for love?The answer will astound you.FIRE WOLF, Book Three Five shifters left the colonies in late spring to explore the other side of the mountain range.What could go wrong?
author: Victoria Danann
